Harry saw through him, but Ron only smirked, embracing love's chaos as part of the game.
- Ron Weasley saw Harry's eyes clouded with mistrust after fierce fights and betrayals. - After two years as an Auror, Ron left to support George at Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. Amidst laughter and chaos, Ron’s true strength was in rebuilding hope, helping craft a new future for the wizarding world alongside those he loved.
- Ron Weasley became godfather to Harry and Ginny's son, feeling a deep sense of responsibility and affection. When he saw Harry and Hermione on Chocolate Frog Cards, Ron's pride overwhelmed him—his finest hour etched in history, yet nothing compared to the love he held for his family.
